name: asw-cookbook
description: CookBook is a web app for those who love to cook and/or eat healthy. The platform aims to offer the exchange of recipes (traditional or customized) of all sorts of food (appetizers, first courses, main courses, desserts, drinks, condiments, ...) ## Requirements - docker-compose

scripts.install:sub-projects: cd ./commons && npm install && cd ../cookbook-app && npm install && cd ../cookbook-server && npm install && cd ../environment && npm install
scripts.build: cd ./commons && npm run modules:build && cd ../cookbook-server && npm run server:build && cd ../cookbook-app && npm run client:build:tsc && npm run client:build:production

author: Marica Pasquali
